scripts.nuke: rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && npm install && lerna exec "rm -f package-lock.json npm-shrinkwrap.json" && lerna clean --yes && lerna bootstrap && lerna exec --stream -- "test -f package-lock.json || npm install --package-lock-only"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules & rm -rf packages/*/node_modules & rm -rf packages/*/src/*.js* & rm -rf packages/*/src/*.d.ts & rm -rf packages/*/bundle & rm -rf packages/*/*/src/*.js* & rm -rf packages/*/*/src/*.d.ts & rm -rf packages/*/*/bundle
